name: HippiesVsCops
description:
This game is in current development, so is normal if you see some animation errors or something like that. We are now designing the economy and character skills to make it more interesting and difficult as well.

Tutorial:

1.Select the grid squares.

2.Buy one character to put in that square.

3.Earn more money as time passes.

4.You lose if 3 cops reach the house.

5.Have fun!
